european union (â **eu** â) data protection laws make a distinction
between organizations that process personal data for their own purposes (known
as " **data controllers** ") and organizations that process personal data on
behalf of other organizations (known as " **data processors** "). [CLS] [SEP] depending on
the particular circumstance, goguardian and your school may act either as a
data controller or a data processor of your personal data. [CLS] [SEP] the laws in some
jurisdictions like the eu also require data controllers to share the legal
ground that they rely upon to use or disclose personal information. [CLS] [SEP]

### **goguardian as a data controller vs. [CLS] [SEP] data processor**

goguardian is considered the âprocessorâ of **school information** (except
for **school profile information** ), **personal student information** and
**parent/guardian information**. [CLS] [SEP] goguardian collects, uses, shares and
discloses this information as a processor on behalf of and at the instruction
of the school controller, pursuant to [our
eula](https://www.goguardian.com/eula/) and, if applicable,
[dpa](https://www.goguardian.com/dpa/). [CLS] [SEP] if you have a question or complaint
about how your personal data is handled, please contact your school. [CLS] [SEP]

goguardian is considered the âcontrollerâ of **school profile
information** and **school log and cookie information**. [CLS] [SEP] goguardian as the
data controller collects, uses, shares, and discloses this information as
described above in this product privacy policy. [CLS] [SEP] we retain the personal data
contained in this information for as long as necessary to provide you with
goguardian offerings, or for other important purposes such as complying with
legal obligations, resolving disputes, and enforcing our agreements. [CLS] [SEP]

our legal grounds for using **school profile information** and **school log
and cookie information** are as follows:

  * **_contractual commitments:_** we use, share, and disclose information to honor our contractual commitments to a school. [CLS] [SEP]
  * **_legal compliance:_** we need to use, share, and disclose information in certain ways to comply with our legal obligations. [CLS] [SEP]
  * **_with your consent:_** where required by law, and in some other cases, we use, share, or disclose information on the basis of consent. [CLS] [SEP]
  * **_legitimate interests:_** in many cases, we use, share, or disclose information on the ground that it furthers our legitimate business interests in ways that are not overridden by the interests or fundamental rights and freedoms of the affected individuals, such as customer service, analyzing and improving our business, promotional activities, providing security for our goguardian offerings, preventing fraud, and managing legal issues. [CLS] [SEP]

goguardian offerings are operated in the united states. [CLS] [SEP] if you are located

information may be subject to united states law, including laws that may

may export personal data to jurisdictions outside the european economic area
on the basis of legal mechanisms approved by the european commission and other
relevant authorities for cross-border data transfers, such as standard
contractual clauses. [CLS] [SEP]

  * **_european union-united states and swiss-united states privacy shield:_** goguardian has certified to the eu-united states and swiss-united states privacy shield frameworks as set forth by the u.s. [CLS] [SEP] department of commerce regarding the collection, use, and retention of âpersonal dataâ (as defined under the privacy shield principles) from applicable european countries. [CLS] [SEP] we recognize that the court of justice of the european union ruled in july 2020 that a certification under the eu-u.s. [CLS] [SEP] privacy shield framework no longer can serve as the basis by which entities subject to the gdpr export personal data to jurisdictions outside the european economic area. [CLS] [SEP] goguardian will continue to honor its obligation to comply with the privacy shield principles with respect to data that was transferred pursuant to the privacy shield framework. [CLS] [SEP] for such data, goguardian has certified that we adhere to the privacy shield principles of notice, choice, purpose limitation, onward transfer, security, data integrity, access, recourse, liability, and enforcement for such personal data. [CLS] [SEP] to learn more about the privacy shield framework, visit the department of commerceâs privacy shield list by clicking [here](http://www.privacyshield.gov/). [CLS] [SEP] as required under the principles, when goguardian receives personal data under the privacy shield and then transfers it to a third-party service provider acting as an agent on goguardianâs behalf, we have certain liability under the privacy shield if both (i) the agent processes the information in a manner inconsistent with the privacy shield; and (ii) goguardian is responsible for the event giving rise to the damage.   * **_choices of international users:_** some international users (including those whose information we collect under the privacy shield) of goguardian offerings have certain legal rights to access certain information that we hold about them and to request its deletion. ## cookies notice

**_what are cookies?_**

cookies are small text files stored on your computer that allow us to
understand usage of goguardian offerings. [CLS] [SEP] cookies include cookies, internet
server logs, tags, software development kit/sdks, tracking pixels, and other
similar tracking technologies. [CLS] [SEP] a number of cookies that we use last only for
the duration of your session, expiring when your session ends (the so-called
"session cookies"). [CLS] [SEP] other cookies are used to help our systems recognize you
if you return to goguardian offerings and will thus retained longer (the so-
called "persistent cookies"). [CLS] [SEP] some of the cookies used on our goguardian
offerings are set by us, and some are set by third parties that are delivering
services on our behalf. [CLS] [SEP]

**_what types of cookies does goguardian use and what data do they collect?_**

we use cookies in **goguardian offerings** that automatically collect
information to:

  * understand usage of goguardian offerings and to improve these goguardian offerings;
  * authenticate your account; and
  * remember your settings and account information. [CLS] [SEP]

**we do _not_ use any advertising cookies in our offerings and we do not place
advertisements in goguardian offerings.**

**_what are my choices about cookies?_**

you can learn more about how cookies work and how to turn them off in your
particular browsers. [CLS] [SEP] please remember that if you replace, change or upgrade
your browser, or delete your cookies, you may need to use these opt-out tools
again. [CLS] [SEP]

for information about cookies used by the developers of these browsers, please
visit:

  * [internet explorer](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/17442/windows-internet-explorer-delete-manage-cookies)
  * [google chrome](https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/95647?hl=en-gb)
  * [internet explorer 9](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/260971)
  * [mozilla firefox](https://support.mozilla.org/en-us/kb/cookies-information-websites-store-on-your-computer)
  * [safari (desktop)](https://support.apple.com/kb/ph5042?locale=en_us)
  * [safari (mobile)](https://support.apple.com/en-us/ht201265)
  * [android browser](http://support.google.com/ics/nexus/bin/answer.py?hl=en)

for controls specific to advertising and analytics services offered by google,
click [here](https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout) from each of your
browsers. [CLS] [SEP]

**note about do not track:** do not track (âdntâ): is a privacy preference
that users can set in certain web browsers to inform websites and services
that they do not want certain information about their webpage visits collected
over time and across websites or online services. [CLS] [SEP] some browsers do not
recognize dnt settings. [CLS] [SEP] at this time, we do not recognize or respond to
browser-initiated dnt signals because we do not track you across websites. [CLS] [SEP]
